name: hustle
short_effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
flavor_text.platinum: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
